scripts.test: docker pull --quiet cypress/included:4.0.0 && docker run --network='host' -v $PWD:/e2e -w /e2e cypress/included:4.0.0 --browser chrome  --record --parallel --ci-build-id $BUILD_BUILDNUMBER --group 'Azure CI'  --reporter junit --reporter-options mochaFile=junit-result.xml,toConsole=true && docker run --network='host' -v $PWD:/e2e -w /e2e cypress/included:4.0.0 --browser firefox  --record --parallel --ci-build-id $BUILD_BUILDNUMBER --group 'Azure CI'  --reporter junit --reporter-options mochaFile=junit-result.xml,toConsole=true
